title: Hot property: homes with wellness features
text:
Villa, Istria, Croatia, €3.97m

Where In Novigrad, northern Croatia, at the top of the Istrian peninsula. The nearest airport is Pula, 75km or 50 minutes' drive away. Across the border in Italy, Trieste airport is 100km, or about one hour 20 minutes, by road.

What A four-bedroom, two-bathroom villa just a few metres from the beach. The top floor dining room overlooks the Adriatic. The property enjoys terrace views of the sea and the ramparts of Novigrad old town.

Why As well as an outdoor pool, there is an indoor pool with access to a sundeck. The villa has a sauna and an exercise room.

Who Luxury Portfolio International

Villa, Baja California Sur, Mexico, $9.8m

Where In the Pacific resort of San José del Cabo in the south of Baja California peninsula. Los Cabos International Airport is eight miles north of the city, a 13-minute drive.

What A six-bedroom property with en suite baths. It faces the ocean and has ready beach access.

Why Facilities include a pool, gym and massage salon. The property also has an art studio. Golf and pitch-and-putt courses are nearby.

Who Engel & Völkers

Terraced house, Vauxhall, London, £2.2m

Where Just south of the Thames in the fast-changing area that now hosts the US Embassy in Nine Elms. The cafés and bars of South Lambeth Road's Little Portugal area are close at hand.

What A four-bedroom, three-bathroom property in a pleasant square. The Victorian house has been recently modernised.

Why The house has a gym and sauna room in the basement, as well as a south-facing roof terrace and a small garden with a pond.

Who KFH
